name: Brick Battle (Kollektivet)
description:
Welcome landlubber!

If you ever dreamed of the seven seas but never had the opportunity to go, we can offer you the second best!

Welcome to the port of Balancia! 

We are always in need of capable and competitive personnel ready to do whatever it takes to have the most cargo ready at the end of the day. The crane operator with the most crates in their loading zone wins our personnel of the day plaque!
Good luck to you and your friends, may the greatest crane operator win!

Job Application;

  • 2-4 Players
  • Competitive personality
  • Good stress management
  • Ready to have a good time!

Cargo;

  • The average crate. Collect and get points!
  •  Explosive! Watch out or your cargo might get wings!
  •   Freezing! With some luck it might freeze cargo in place!
  •   Bouncy! No clue what they are filled with, but bounce they do!
